text: Mouloudou is a settlement in the East Province of Cameroon. Of the tropical forest in the area, 1,082,454 km² is protected for community hunting.MINEF. Mouloudou was the site of a German station during the colonial period. The station was set up by Hans Dominik with the aid of Karl Atangana.Ahanda. ==Notes== ==References== * Ahanda, Marie-Thérèse Assiga (2003): "Charles Atangana". Bonaberi.com. Accessed 30 October 2006. * "Présentation des Aires Protégées". Ministère des Forêts et de la Faune du Cameroun (MINEF). Accessed 7 November 2006. Category:Populated places in East Region (Cameroon)
title: Mouloudou
